definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Location theory is one of basic parts of economic geography.
sentences.chinese: 区位理论是现代经济地理学基本理论的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Li Siguang is a famous geographer.
sentences.chinese: 李四光是一位著名的地理学家。

sentences.english: Prof, Zhu Kezhcn is both a pioneer and a founder of modern geography in China.
sentences.chinese: 竺可桢教授是中国近代科学地理学的先驱与奠基人。

sentences.english: Spatial characteristics of tourism flow is one of the most important contents in tourism geography.
sentences.chinese: 旅游客流空间特性是旅游地理学重要研究内容之一。

sentences.english: The muscid biogeography of Qinghai-Xizang Plateau is studied.
sentences.chinese: 对青藏高原蝇科昆虫进行了生物地理学研究。

sentences.english: Professor Shen Yuchang is a famous geographer and outstanding geomorphologist in China.
sentences.chinese: 沈玉昌教授是我国著名的地理学家和杰出的地貌学家。

sentences.english: It is very important for geographers to know and understand the history of geographical ideas.
sentences.chinese: 地理学思想史研究对地理学学科发展具有重要意义。

sentences.english: It is very important for geographers to know and understand the history of geographical ideas.
sentences.chinese: 地理学思想史研究对地理学学科发展具有重要意义。

sentences.english: Wieser, J. 1992 Vegetation of the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 王荷生，1992，植物区系地理学，科学出版社。

sentences.english: The theory of historical biogeography mainly consists of vicariance and dispersion.
sentences.chinese: 历史生物地理学的理论主要是扩散和隔离分化的理论。

sentences.english: The man-environment relationship is an essential part of human-geographic studies.
sentences.chinese: 人地关系起人文地理学研究的核心内容。

sentences.english: Methods Using zoogeography principle and method.
sentences.chinese: 方法运用动物地理学原理和方法。

sentences.english: The meaning of geography had changed.
LI Dao-yuan is one of the most famous geographers in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 郦道元是古代最著名的地理学家之一。

sentences.english: Many geographers say that the Ural Mountains form the dividing line between Europe and Asia.
sentences.chinese: 许多地理学家认为，乌拉尔山脉是欧亚两洲的分界线。

sentences.english: It is now the geographers' job to rewrite theirs.
sentences.chinese: 现在是地理学家们改写地理教科书的时候了。
